org.apache.ambari.server.state

Interface Clusters

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClustersImpl

    public interface Clusters
    Single entity that tracks all clusters and hosts that are managed by the Ambari server

        void addCluster(String clusterName,
                StackId stackId)
         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Add a new Cluster
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the cluster name (not null).
        stackId - the stack for the cluster (not null).
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

                StackId stackId,
                SecurityType securityType)
         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Add a new cluster
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the cluster name (not null).
        stackId - the stack for the cluster (not null).
        securityType - the cluster will be created with this security type.

        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • isHostMappedToCluster

        boolean isHostMappedToCluster(long clusterId,
                              String hostName)
        Gets whether the specified cluster has a mapping for the specified host.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - the cluster ID
        hostName - the host (not null).
        Returns:
        true if the host belongs to the cluster, false otherwise.

      • checkPermission

        boolean checkPermission(String clusterName,
                        boolean readOnly)
        Determine whether or not access to the cluster resource identified by the given cluster name should be allowed based on the permissions granted to the current user.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the cluster name
        readOnly - indicate whether or not this check is for a read only operation
        Returns:
        true if access to the cluster is allowed

      • addSessionAttributes

        void addSessionAttributes(String name,
                          Map<String,Object> attributes)
        Add the given map of attributes to the session for the cluster identified by the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the cluster name
        attributes - the session attributes

      • getSessionAttributes

        Map<String,Object> getSessionAttributes(String name)
        Get the map of session attributes for the cluster identified by the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the cluster name
        Returns:
        the map of session attributes for the cluster; never null

      • getClusterSize

        int getClusterSize(String clusterName)
        Returns the number of hosts that form the cluster identified by the given name.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name that identifies the cluster
        Returns:
        number of hosts that form the cluster

      • invalidate

        void invalidate(Cluster cluster)
        Invalidates the specified cluster by retrieving it from the database and refreshing all of the internal stateful collections.
        Parameters:
        cluster - the cluster to invalidate and refresh (not null).

      • invalidateAllClusters

        void invalidateAllClusters()
        Invalidates all clusters by retrieving each from the database and refreshing all of its internal stateful collections.
